title: NK Vrapče
text:
NK Vrapče is a <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>n <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club founded in 1938, in <a href="Zagreb">Zagreb</a>'s neighbourhood <a href="Vrap%C4%8De%2C%20Zagreb">Vrapče</a> which is situated in west part of the city. Its characteristic <a href="color">color</a> is <a href="yellow">yellow</a>.
In seasons of 1992–1997, NK Vrapče played in <a href="Croatian%20Second%20League">Croatian Second League</a> and that was the biggest success of this club.
